img_text: Over the past several hours I have been receiving several rude and threatening comments, tweets, emails and DM's over a song and cover art that is not rightfully mine but whereas 1 ama featured artist.. These actions caused me to step out of my character and post my own malicious tweets and comments, however, I take full responsibility for my actions. I apologize to all of my family, friends and supporters if I have embarrassed you. From here on out, 1 promise to be mindful of my words and actions. Thank you to all of my genuine supporters, you guys are greaty appreciated. thank my for the continued support and I genuinely apologize on my behalf. Thank You,
